medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began 26 hours ago after eating a fried breakfast sandwich. Initially severe, sharp, and constant, the pain has improved. The patient currently complains of moderate RUQ and midepigastric pain with radiation to the back. Similar attacks related to food have occurred in the past, often waking him from sleep.
medical_history.family_history: Gallstone disease in mother and two daughters
